## IBubble.getRelativeToSurfaceXY() method

Return the coordinates of the top-left corner of this bubble's body relative to the drawing surface's origin (0,0), in workspace units.  Object with .x and .y properties.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getRelativeToSurfaceXY(): Coordinate;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Coordinate
